bioconda.name: mity
bioconda.summary: Mity is a bioinformatic analysis pipeline designed to call mitochondrial SNV and INDEL variants from Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) data.

biotools.summary:
A highly sensitive mitochondrial variant analysis pipeline for whole genome sequencing data.

Technically you can run mity call and mity normalise separately, but since mity report requires a normalised vcf file, we recommend running mity call --normalise

bioschemas.name: mity
bioschemas.summary:
A highly sensitive mitochondrial variant analysis pipeline for whole genome sequencing data.

Technically you can run mity call and mity normalise separately, but since mity report requires a normalised vcf file, we recommend running mity call --normalise
